fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If the nearest living player above or below you on the player list is evil, a message will be publicly announce that says "The Tamer's dog smelled something..."
- Example: Players 1-7 are in the game, 2 and 3 are dead and 4 is the Tamer. If player 1 or player 5 is evil, the message will appear.
- Evil players are REF members. Neutrals do not trigger your dog.
